questions.explanation: The father of nation is Mahatma Gandi

questions.questionText: The Paithan (Jayakwadi) Hydro-electric project, completed with the help of Japan, is on the river?
questions.explanation: Godavari is the Hydro electric project.

questions.questionText: The nucleus of an atom consists of?
It is easier to roll a stone up a sloping road than to lift it vertical upwards because?

options.text: work done in rolling a stone is greather than in lifting it
work done in rolling a stone is less than in lifting it
work done in lifting the stone is equal to rolling it
work done in rolling is more than in lifting

questions.explanation: The work done is the same but the rate of doing work is greater on lifting.

questions.questionText: Ordinary table salt is sodium chloride. What is baking soda?

options.text: increase in the thickness of ozone layer in troposphere
decrease in the ozone layer in troposphere
increase in thickness of ozone layer in stratosphere
decrease in thickness of ozone layer in stratosphere

questions.explanation: The ozone layer refers to the tiny layer in the atmosphere that reached the amount of the sun's height from getting to the surface of the earth.

questions.questionText: Former Australian captain Mark Taylor has had several nicknames over his playing career. Which of the following was NOT one of them?
questions.explanation: He was christened 'Helium Bat' very early in his career by team mates, due to his habit of lifting his bat over his shoulder and letting anything bowled outside the off-stump go by.

questions.questionText: Which county did Ravi Shastri play for?
questions.explanation: Ravi Shastri once hit spinner Tilak Raj for 6 sixes in an over in a First Class match.
Rajiv Gandhi's birthday is celebrated as Sadbhawana Diwas on 20th August.
